Pre-Game Insights: Oklahoma City hosts Golden State aiming to extend its four-game home winning streak.
Oklahoma City finished 57-25 overall, 36-16 in Western Conference action and 33-8 at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Thunder averaged 20.5 points off of turnovers, 11.8 second-chance points and 34.6 bench points last season.
Golden State went 46-36 overall and 26-26 in Western Conference play during the 2023-24 season.
The Warriors averaged 117.8 points per game last season, 48.6 in the paint, 16.2 off of turnovers and 12.4 on fast breaks.
Others: Thunder injuries: Kenrich Williams (knee), Isaiah Hartenstein (hand), Jaylin Williams (hamstring), Nikola Topic (acl).
